blog.title: this is new blog
blog.body: While schools and other tertiary institutions opened for third term yesterday (Monday, January 18, 2021), Ismail Mulindwa, the chairperson of the education ministry taskforce on the coronavirus pandemic, was reluctant to comment on the return of the rest of the students, but promised that the education ministry permanent secretary would communicate once the final plans are concluded.
blog.author: henry
